plot: John Oliver dissects claims about migrant crime from the Republican National Convention, highlighting how the narrative has shifted political landscapes. He also advises viewers to drink water, visit the dentist.

John Oliver Breaks Down The Promised Unity Talks In The R.N.C. He Fact Checked About All The Claims About Migrant Crime And That Narrative Has Shifted The Stage Of The Politics Of The Two Major Parties In United States Of America. Finally He Reminds Everyone To Drink Water, See A Dentist And One Other Important Thing.—Niaz Islam Arif
